dmca.title: Six Flags flags down image site
dmca.body:
Re: Digital Millenium Copyright Act (DMCA)
Notice Regarding/ ytmnd.com/ Website
OFGS File No. 3/3262-746

Dear Sir or Madam:



We are counsel to Six Flags, Inc. (?Six Flags?). This is a
notice of infringement sent pursuant to the Digital Millenium Copyright
Act (DMCA). We are writing to you because it is our understanding that
Reflected Networks is the web hosting provider for the website
corresponding to the domain name/ ytmnd.com/.

It has come to our attention that unauthorized and infringing
copies of Six Flags images appear within at least twenty-nine (29)
webpages within the ytmnd.com/ website. The location and nature of the
copyrighted works claimed to have been infringed are as follows:

[private]

Pursuant to the DMCA, I, the undersigned, certify under penalty
of perjury that I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf
of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being
named Six Flags (?IP Owner?). I have a good faith belief that the
materials noted above are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its
agents, or the law, and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights
according to state, federal, or United States law.

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the
material or items claimed to be infringing. You may contact the
undersigned as follows:

Printed Name: [private]

Title & Company: Associate Attorney,

Ostrolenk, Faber, Gerb & Soffen, LLP

Street Address: [private]

City and State: New York, New York

Zip: 10036-8403

Email: [private]@ostrolenk.com

Telephone: (212) [private]

Fax: (212) [private]

Date: July 6, 2005

This notice is without prejudice to our client?s right to take
any and all appropriate action against these infringements.

If you have any questions, please contact the undersigned.


Very truly yours,

/[private]/

----------------------------------------------------------------------
*****[private]*
Ostrolenk, Faber, Gerb & Soffen, LLP
[private]
New York, New York 10036
Direct: (212) [private]
Fax: (212) [private]
_[private]@ostrolenk.com_ <mailto:[private]@ostrolenk.com>
